import React, { useCallback } from 'react' import AppLayOut from "../components/AppLayOut" import {Form,Input} from 'antd' import Head from 'next/head' import useInput from '../hooks/useInput' const Signup = () => { const [id, onChangeId] = useInput(''); const [nickname, onChangeNickname] = useInput(''); const [pw, onChangePw] = useInput(''); const [pwchk, onChangePwchk] = useInput(''); return ( 회원가입 - NodeBird




) } export default Signup;
